chapter.title: First steps in OTRS::ITSM
chapter.para: OTRS::ITSM completely uses the agent and customer interfaces (customer frontend) implemented in OTRS. If OTRS has been used before, all features and steps such as login, queue configuration, user preferences, filters, rules, user permissions etc. can continually be used without any modifications.

Detailed information on the settings and proceedings identical in OTRS and OTRS::ITSM are provided at http://doc.otrs.org/2.3/en/html/ in the OTRS Admin Manual, which is constantly being revised.
